Final volume is   per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":92,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":215,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bbrvd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"15ga5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.2"}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"6":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"749hg","text":"Molecular or chemical chaperones can be included in the reaction in order to study their effect on Tau aggregation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3g3kj","text":"Seal the plate with parafilm to avoid evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tau aggregation monitored by thioflavin-T (ThT) fluorescence in a plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ccueb","text":"Set the following parameters in a SPARK multimode microplate reader (TECAN) and start the reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eeafi","text":"Fluorescence measurement: ThT signal, excitation 440 nm, emission 480 nm, (use gain regulation) measured every 2 minutes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q8ot","text":"Temperature  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5o600","text":"Constant shaking (50 seconds linear shaking: amplitude 4.5 mm, frequency 420 rpm - 50 seconds orbital shaking: amplitude 1.5 mm, frequency 360 rpm).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jc8a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3b33a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4taak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vdhb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5o7mm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6p4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhfpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2fa3j","text":"SPARK multimode microplate reader (TECAN) is highly recommended due to its high sensitivity and the gain regulation mode that increases the fluorescence detection window. When using other plate readers, the sample ThT signal easily gets saturated even when reducing initial gain to the minimum gain capacity. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"49tot","text":"Cysteine-free TauRD (Tau residues 244-371, C291A/P301L/C322A/V337M), rapidly aggregates under these conditions, reaching the ThT plateau after 2 h aggregation.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":335,"id":440009,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppymbixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppyjbixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppykbixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ppyibixhp.webp","width":441}}}}
